ygData.subject: Re: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is the truth. There are a lot of dumb people playing. This morning someone in Lake Rathe was shouting for someone to group with them and go to 1000
ygData.messageBody:
>Rumors are funny things. Someone posts some info, someone
>else jokes about it, someone else doesn't get the joke and
>takes it as truth, and someone who didn't know any of this was
>going on hears the (now wildly distorted) rumor from the last
>person. The second in the above link is here:


This is the truth. There are a lot of dumb people playing. This morning
someone in Lake Rathe was shouting for someone to group with them and go to
1000 island. I shout back 'not right now, I'm dressing' (I couldn't help it,
I had just woken up, heh). The next thing I know this person is giving me a
tell 'so when you're finished getting dressed do you want to group?' ACK. Me
humor was wasted (pathetic attempt though it may have been).

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel of Fennin Ro
